Text.Name: Body_Gong_2
Text.Desc: A remold cultivation Law created by human physical cultivators in reference to ancient sages' natural Yaoguai bodies. This Law is noted for its wild and aggressive nature and excels at refining bones to eventually create a Barbarous Forging Body. The physical body becomes divine and embraces oblivion.
Text.SelectDesc: Physical training means combining energy, Qi and spirit into one, cutting out Qi and any other magical items and beginning practice with only the physical body. Do you want to take this Law?
